member.name: D2D1_PRINT_CONTROL_PROPERTIES
member.summary: The creation properties for a object.

member.name: D2D1_PRINT_CONTROL_PROPERTIES.fontSubset
member.summary: The mode to use for subsetting fonts for printing, defaults to .

member.name: D2D1_PRINT_CONTROL_PROPERTIES.rasterDPI
member.summary: DPI for rasterization of all unsupported Direct2D commands or options, defaults to 150.0.

member.name: D2D1_PRINT_CONTROL_PROPERTIES.colorSpace
member.summary: Color space for vector graphics, defaults to .
